Hello experts,

I need to access my viewmodel/view classes in another project in same solution. I am using WPF with Prism framework. Any suggestions?

Hi,

I believe you could benefit from using dependency injection containers to achieve this kind of scenarios, this way you should be able to register your view / view models to the container for example through a specific contract name or a common Interface referenced by all your projects. Which will allow you to consume this classes from different projects without knowing their specific implementation.

For more information about the use of dependency injection containers you could check the following chapter of the Prism documentation:

  • Chapter 3: Managing Dependencies Between Components

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
